quote: It is peculiar to “ressentiment criticism” that it does not seriously desire that its demands be fulfilled. It does not want to cure the evil. The evil is merely the pretext for the criticism.
quote_letters: IT IS PECULIAR TO RESSENTIMENT CRITICISM THAT IT DOES NOT SERIOUSLY DESIRE THAT ITS DEMANDS BE FULFILLED IT DOES NOT WANT TO CURE THE EVIL THE EVIL IS MERELY THE PRETEXT FOR THE CRITICISM
